title: VAE + Diffusion Models
description: Variational autoencoders, latent space manipulation, diffusion model architecture, and denoising processes

criteria.name: Correctness
criteria.description: Functional VAE with proper loss calculation, working diffusion model, successful generation.

excellent.description: VAE trains correctly with KL divergence and reconstruction loss properly balanced. Diffusion model generates high-quality samples. Latent space shows meaningful structure.

good.description: VAE mostly functional with minor loss issues. Diffusion model produces recognizable outputs. Latent space partially interpretable.

satisfactory.description: VAE trains but with imbalanced losses. Diffusion model works partially. Generated samples are poor quality.

poor.description: VAE fails to train properly. Diffusion model doesn't work. No successful generation.

criteria.name: Code Quality
criteria.description: VAE architecture, diffusion model implementation, training loop quality, and code organization.

excellent.description: Excellent VAE encoder-decoder architecture. Well-implemented diffusion process with proper noise scheduling. Clean, modular training code.

good.description: Good VAE structure. Functional diffusion implementation. Organized training code with minor issues.

satisfactory.description: Basic VAE implementation. Simple diffusion model. Training code works but messy.

poor.description: Poor architecture design. Broken diffusion process. Disorganized, hard-to-follow code.

criteria.name: Documentation
criteria.description: Architecture explanations, loss function documentation, latent space analysis, generation process description.

excellent.description: Comprehensive documentation of both models. Loss functions clearly explained. Latent space visualizations and analysis. Diffusion process well-documented.

good.description: Good model documentation. Loss functions explained. Some latent space analysis. Diffusion process described.

satisfactory.description: Basic documentation. Key concepts explained. Limited analysis and visualizations.

poor.description: Minimal documentation. No analysis. Models unexplained.

criteria.name: Creativity
criteria.description: Novel VAE architectures, creative latent space exploration, innovative diffusion techniques.

excellent.description: Creative VAE variations (conditional VAE, Î²-VAE). Innovative latent space manipulation. Novel diffusion scheduling or conditioning.

good.description: Interesting model variations. Good latent space experiments. Creative generation techniques.

satisfactory.description: Standard implementations. Basic latent space usage. Minimal creativity.

poor.description: No creativity. Direct copying of tutorials. No experimentation.

allowedTools: GitHub Copilot for code completion and syntax
Stack Overflow for debugging training issues
aiUsagePolicy.guidelines: AI can assist with syntax and debugging, but model architectures and training strategies must demonstrate deep understanding of VAE and diffusion principles.

deliverables: Python file (practical5.py) with VAE implementation (encoder, decoder, loss)
Diffusion model implementation with forward and reverse processes
Latent space visualization (t-SNE or PCA of VAE latent codes)
Generated samples from both VAE and diffusion model
README.md explaining architectures, loss functions, and results analysis
learningObjectives: Understand and implement VAE architecture with reparameterization trick
Balance reconstruction loss and KL divergence in VAE training
Implement diffusion forward and reverse processes
Understand noise scheduling in diffusion models
Explore and manipulate latent spaces for controlled generation
